name: Fuzzies
description: At that time the colorful and cuddly Fuzzies were living happily together in their village.  However, the resident criminals in the castle were not confident in his pale appearance and because of that they decided to blackmail the Fuzzies to get their color with their brutal machines.  And so, the thief attacked the peaceful village of Fuzzie.  It's time for us to save the Fuzzies and help them escape from the cruel crusher machine!  Combine at least 3 Fuzzies of the same color and try to delete all to save them.  Through combos you will get bombs - or mighty rainbowfuzzies.  Can you save the Fuzzies before they get caught in that, let's play
